publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3355# Maureen Macmillan: Drink Driving in the Highlands—That the Parliament notes with concern the continued high incidence of drink driving offences in the Northern Constabulary area and, in particular, the substantial increase in the statistics for driving while unfit through drink or drugs; notes that in one recent 19-day period there were 19 arrests for drink driving in the Ross, Cromarty and Skye Command area alone; further notes that the profile of drink drivers tends to be middle-aged rather than young, and believes that the Scottish Executive should consider how it can better reinforce the message that drink driving is a criminal offence which can result in severe injury and loss of life. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Nanette Milne*

S2M-3355# Maureen Macmillan: Drink Driving in the Highlands—That the Parliament notes with concern the continued high incidence of drink driving offences in the Northern Constabulary area and, in particular, the substantial increase in the statistics for driving while unfit through drink or drugs; notes that in one recent 19-day period there were 19 arrests for drink driving in the Ross, Cromarty and Skye Command area alone; further notes that the profile of drink drivers tends to be middle-aged rather than young, and believes that the Scottish Executive should consider how it can better reinforce the message that drink driving is a criminal offence which can result in severe injury and loss of life. Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Robin Harper, Mrs Nanette Milne, Jackie Baillie*, Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Mr David Davidson*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3355# Drink Driving in the Highlands (lodged on 28 September 2005) Elaine Smith*
